actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to alter the time period for Daylight Savings Time.
short_title: Daylight Savings Time Amendments Act of 1991

summary.text: Daylight Savings Time Amendments Act of 1991 - Amends the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to extend the period of daylight savings time from the last Sunday of October to the first Sunday in November.

titles.title: Daylight Savings Time Amendments Act of 1991
To amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to alter the time period for Daylight Savings Time.
